description:
Have you ever wondered how those professional flea market "pickers" on TV get such amazing deals?

Would you like to discover the proven secrets of a flea market "master", someone who literally grew up selling at Southern California flea markets and has honed his deal-finding to a fine art?

If you've ever wanted to know the secrets of getting amazing bargains, deals (and even steals) at your local flea markets, then this is the Udemy course for you!

When I was seven years old, my parents started a humble flea market business.

Understanding The Mindset Of Flea Market Sellers Can Get You Deals

From age 7 to about age 22, I was selling at Southern California flea markets and, more importantly, I got an insider's view of what it was like to be a seller - I learned the "mindset".

This mindset would come in handy as I bought and sold thousands of items at flea markets and it was the main reason I was able to get some amazing deals and bargains!

In this course, you will learn all about the seller's mindset and how you can use this knowledge to your advantage in getting great deals.

(Just think of how much money you'll save and how much money you can make by "flipping" some of these items on eBay!)

Become A Great Negotiator With Proven Methods

Not a very good negotiator?

While negotiating is pretty much expected at flea markets, (and you're kind of looked down upon by savvy sellers if you don't negotiate) not everyone has learned this valuable skill.

No problem! In this course, you also get an entire section devoted to making you a powerful negotiator at flea markets.

By simply understanding the "flea market game" better and by following my simple negotiation tactics, you'll be a flea market negotiating master in no time!

5 Proven Strategies For Finding Amazing Deals

This course also contains my 5 proven strategies for finding and buying amazing deals at flea markets.

These strategies (many of which were invented by me) are proven to get you amazing deals. I walk you through each method in great detail so you can duplicate my success and land some amazing deals of your own!

Flip Those Finds On eBay For High Profits

And, if you want to take your flea market finds and flip them for high profits, there's also an entire section devoted to "arbitrage" and the various ways you can make money from the various bargains you buy!

My System Has Been Proven Over 3 Decades

This is a proven system because I have proven it over the last 3 decades, so you can count on this being the absolute BEST course on getting amazing deals anywhere.

This System Is Guaranteed

There's a 30-day money back guarantee, so you can enroll at no risk!
title: Find & Flip Killer Flea Market Bargains On Amazon & eBay
